multi_task_tenancy.critical_rule:
Multi-task development requires strict context isolation. Each task context must be isolated from other task contexts. Task-specific decisions stay in task context, not shared context. Only promote decisions to shared context when they affect multiple tasks.
This is MANDATORY for all modes that use memory bank systems.
multi_task_tenancy.overview: Complete multi-task tenancy system rules defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/universal/multi-task-tenancy.md
multi_task_tenancy.includes: - Two-tier tenancy architecture (shared + task contexts) - Automatic task detection from git branches - Context isolation rules and boundaries - Merge and integration workflow - Mode behavior adaptations - Task handoff protocol - Implementation checklist - Anti-patterns to avoid
